mapper.select: /* [InvoicePrintCompletMapper.xml] selectInvoicePrintComplet */ SELECT SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, INVOICE_NO AS invoiceNo, WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, CASE WHEN LENGTH(ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO) > 21 THEN SUBSTR(ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO,0,20) ELSE ORIGIN_INVOICE_NO END AS originInvoiceNo, SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidKey, PACK_BOX_SPLIT_YN AS packBoxSplitYn, PACK_BOX_TYPE_RECOM AS packBoxTypeRecom, INVOICE_STATUS AS invoiceStatus, SUBSTR(INVOICE_NO_PRT_YMD,1,8) AS qpsPrintDate, SUBSTR(INVOICE_NO_PRT_YMD,9,6) AS qpsPrintTime, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, MODIFIED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_DOC_INVOICE_HDR WHERE INVOICE_NO_PRT_YN = 'Y' AND INVOICE_PRINT_INTF_YN = 'N' AND PACK_CMPT_INTF_YN = 'Y' AND INVOICE_PRINT_SYSTEM = 'WCS' ORDER BY SHIP_ORDER_KEY ASC , INVOICE_NO ASC
